title: Wordle Backend
summary: .NET 9 backend service for the Wordle game.
description: A backend service for the Wordle game built with Entity Framework Core, JWT authentication, and Clean Architecture. Available as an open source project and live demo.

title: Fitness Tracker API
summary: .NET-based RESTful API for personal fitness tracking.
description: A secure and flexible API for tracking users' workouts, body measurements, and nutrition habits.
